thread.title: Your guide to the 2015 football playoffs
thread.title_full: Your guide to the 2015 football playoffs

author: Shakeem Holloway
title: Your guide to the 2015 football playoffs
text:
Home › SPORTS › Your guide to the 2015 football playoffs Updated: October 20, 2015 5:24 p.m. Your guide to the 2015 football playoffs CovNews Comments You must be logged in to post comments. http://beta.covnews.com/ encourages readers to interact with one another. We will not edit your comments, but we reserve the right to delete any inappropriate responses. To report offensive or inappropriate comments, contact our editor . The comments below are from readers of http://beta.covnews.com/ and do not necessarily represent the views of The Covington News or Morris Multimedia. 
With less than a handful of region games left to play and the state playoffs on the horizon, it’s that time of year coaches and fans start agonizing about or getting excited for what’s to come. Newton and Eastside are all but in the state playoffs, while Alcovy is fighting for its postseason life. 
Here we’ll take a look at each team as they stand currently and their outlook going for as far as playoff seeding goes. 
Newton Current region standing: No. 1 seed Remaining games: @Lovejoy, vs. Lakeside, vs. Rockdale Best-case scenario: Newton finishes 9-1 wins the region title and hosts the first two rounds of the playoffs. Worst-case scenario: The Rams drop all of their remaining games, finish as the No. 3 or No. 4 seed in the region and have to travel early in the playoffs. Likely scenario: see best-case scenario 
Eastside Record: (5-2, 2-1) Current region standing: No. 1 seed Remaining games: @ Hampton, @ Walnut Grove, @/vs. either the No. 1/No. 3 seed from Region 4-AAAA division b Best-case scenario: Eastside wins out. Locust Grove drops two games and the Eagles beat Jonesboro to win the region title and to claim a No. 1 seed in the playoffs, with the first two games coming at home. Worst-case scenario: The Eagles lose their next two games, fall out of the region tournament picture and miss the playoffs completely. Likely scenario: Eastside wins out, remains the No. 2 seed on their side of the region, beats Spalding or Riverdale to claim the No. 3 seed and travels for the playoffs. 
Alcovy
